<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Trudd (The Mighty)](/Deities.aspx?ID=91)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Offer your strength to aid others, protect those weaker than you

**Anathema** Engage in petty showcases of strength, use your strength to take advantage of others

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=573)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)

- **4th**
[Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)

</column>
name: Trudd (The Mighty)
